mean_cn: adj. 强制性的；义务的；必须的
mean_en: that you must do because of the law, rules, etc.; that you do because you always do it, or other people in the same situation always do it
sentence: You can't skip class, attendance at school is obligatory!
sentence_trans: 你不能逃课，上学是你的义务。
word_etyma: oblig=oblige责任，义务 + atory形容词后缀，…的 → 义务的，强制性的
